pkgmetadata.longdescription: asyncwebsockets===============asyncwebsockets is an `anyio`_-compatible websocket client library.Thus it works with `curio`_, `trio`_, or ``asyncio``.Installation------------To install the latest stable version:: $ pip install asyncwebsocketsTo install the latest development version:: $ pip install git+https://github.com/Fuyukai/asyncwebsockets.git#egg=asyncwebsocketsBasic Usage-----------.. code-block:: python3 import anyio import asyncwebsockets async def test(): async with asyncwebsockets.open_websocket("wss://echo.websocket.org") as ws: await ws.send("test") evt = await ws.next_event() print(type(evt), getattr(evt, 'data', None)) anyio.run(test).. _curio: https://curio.readthedocs.io/en/latest/.. _trio: https://trio.readthedocs.io/en/latest/.. _anyio: https://anyio.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
